value:
$nMPID_カゲロウ|Nina said master thieves must always
leave a calling card, so I drew ours.
It's quite good, if I may say so myself.$k$p...Excuse me? It is clearly a cat.

$nMPID_比翼エポニーヌ|The thief escapes, with the guard hot
on his heels. Then, a relationship
blossoms between the two. Hehehe...

$nMPID_比翼エポニーヌ|I'm not really a thief anymore, but
it's not like I regret those days. Even
now, I'm certain I did the right thing.

$nMPID_カゲロウ|I expected thief's attire to differ quite
a bit from that of a ninja's, but...are
these always so gaudy?

$nMPID_カゲロウ|Nina demonstrates considerable
insight on occasion. Perhaps that is
from her time as a chivalrous thief.

$nMPID_比翼エポニーヌ|I can't believe you found us hiding in
the barrels! I guess that's a friend of
$Nf's for you.
$nMPID_カゲロウ|Victory is ours. Now for the treasure...

$nMPID_比翼エポニーヌ|What, did you think I lost my edge
when I gave up on being a thief?
Think again!

$nMPID_カゲロウ|To think I would make such a
blunder... My apologies.

$nMPID_比翼エポニーヌ|Nice! I feel like I'm positively bursting
with motivation!

Sorry to keep you waiting! Nina and
Kagero are on the scene! With our
skills, there's nothing we can't steal!

$nMPID_カゲロウ|Nina, your lock-picking skills are quite
impressive. Is there some trick to it?$k$p$nMPID_比翼エポニーヌ|Hmm... This might sound obvious, but
it's important to think about what
kind of key best fits the keyhole.$k$pWhat shape is the key? What is it
forged from? Copper? Brass? Steel?$k$pWhat's the tensile strength of the
material?$k$pAs the heroic keyhole waits to be
unlocked, does it dream of a
sturdy key? Hehehe...$k$p$nMPID_カゲロウ|I can't say I understand any of that,
but you clearly have a passion for
locksmithing.$k$p$nMPID_比翼エポニーヌ|Not with me yet? I can't wait for the
day when just seeing a key on a table
is enough to get your heart racing!
$nMPID_二人|Hand it over!
$nMPID_二人|With style! And stealth.
$nMPID_比翼エポニーヌ|Watch your flanks!
$nMPID_カゲロウ|All mine.
What a letdown...
Don't get caught.
Silently.

•  We can steal...
•  Anything!

• Focus on the task.
• Look at those two!

• Thief and guard... A forbidden romance...
• What are you mumbling about?
Destination?
Super sneaky.
Stay calm.

$nMPID_比翼エポニーヌ|So, looks like we'll be doing a bit of
thievery! Don't worry, this is old hat
for me. I'll show you how it's done.

$nMPID_カゲロウ|My expertise is more in espionage
than theft. I will gratefully take
your instruction.

Demonstrate your secrets. I am
eager to learn!

$nMPID_比翼エポニーヌ|Really?! Ooo, how exciting! With my
help, you'll be a master in no time.
Trust me.

First things first: observe your target
closely. Evaluate security. Determine
any possible weak points.
$nMPID_カゲロウ|Understood.

$nMPID_比翼エポニーヌ|Let's say we're looking at Askr's
treasury, right? There are these two
guards who have regular duty there.

There's a tall skinny one with dark
hair, and a shorter one who's ginger.

The ginger's the superior officer—you
can tell by the way the dark-haired
one talks. But that's not all I realized.

$nMPID_カゲロウ|Mmm. You've got my attention.
What else?

$nMPID_比翼エポニーヌ|The more they work together, how they
speak gets less formal... Ooo, they're
getting closer by the day, I know it!

It's only a matter of time until they're
sharing secrets. Confiding deep, dark
vulnerabilities. Holding hands!

$nMPID_カゲロウ|W-wait a moment. What does this
have to do with thievery?

$nMPID_比翼エポニーヌ|All they need is a dash of danger—
some action to make them realize
how much they mean to each other!

And who's gonna give them that?
We are. We're the matchmakers.

We'll snatch the shinies from the
treasury and lead them on a merry
chase. Come on, let's do this!

$nMPID_カゲロウ|You left me behind a while ago.
However, your enthusiasm is
admirable!
